SELECT IFNULL(b.line_name,'') as linename, IFNULL(b.linkdir,'') as linkdir, IFNULL(b.price ,'')as price, IFNULL(b.start_time,'') as starttime, IFNULL(b.end_time,'') as endtime, IFNULL(b.line_type ,'')as linetype, IFNULL(b.installation_number,'') AS installationnumber, IFNULL(b.match_number,'') AS matchnumber, IFNULL(b.dictionary_id ,'')as dictionaryid, IFNULL(b.id,'')as id, IFNULL(b.line_id,'')as lineid

SELECT count(1) FROM bus_stop WHERE line_id=#{id}
SELECT bs.id AS id, bs.lat AS lat, bs.lon AS lon, bs.stop_type AS stoptype, bs.stop_name AS endstop, bs.stopseq AS stopseq FROM bus_stop bs WHERE line_id = #{lineid} ORDER BY stopseq ASC
SELECT stop_name AS startstop FROM bus_stop WHERE line_id = #{id} ORDER BY stopseq ASC LIMIT 1
SELECT stop_name AS endstop FROM bus_stop WHERE line_id = #{id} ORDER BY stopseq DESC LIMIT 1
